org.apache.flink.configuration

类 HighAvailabilityOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.configuration.HighAvailabilityOptions

  • @PublicEvolving
public class HighAvailabilityOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    The set of configuration options relating to high-availability settings.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_CLUSTER_ID
      The ID of the Flink cluster, used to separate multiple Flink clusters Needs to be set for standalone clusters, is automatically inferred in YARN and Mesos.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_JOB_DELAY
      The time before a JobManager after a fail over recovers the current jobs.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_JOB_MANAGER_PORT_RANGE
      Optional port (range) used by the job manager in high-availability mode.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_MODE
      Defines high-availability mode used for the cluster execution.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_STORAGE_PATH
      File system path (URI) where Flink persists metadata in high-availability setups
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_ZOOKEEPER_CHECKPOINT_COUNTER_PATH
      ZooKeeper root path (ZNode) for checkpoint counters.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_ZOOKEEPER_CHECKPOINTS_PATH
      ZooKeeper root path (ZNode) for completed checkpoints.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_ZOOKEEPER_JOBGRAPHS_PATH
      ZooKeeper root path (ZNode) for job graphs.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_ZOOKEEPER_LATCH_PATH 
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_ZOOKEEPER_LEADER_PATH 
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_ZOOKEEPER_MESOS_WORKERS_PATH
      ZooKeeper root path (ZNode) for Mesos workers.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_ZOOKEEPER_NAMESPACE 
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_ZOOKEEPER_QUORUM
      The ZooKeeper quorum to use, when running Flink in a high-availability mode with ZooKeeper.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_ZOOKEEPER_ROOT
      The root path under which Flink stores its entries in ZooKeeper
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> ZOOKEEPER_CLIENT_ACL 
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> ZOOKEEPER_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT 
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> ZOOKEEPER_MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS 
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> ZOOKEEPER_RETRY_WAIT 
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> ZOOKEEPER_RUNNING_JOB_REGISTRY_PATH 
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> ZOOKEEPER_SESSION_TIMEOUT

    • 字段详细资料

      • HA_MODE

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_MODE
        Defines high-availability mode used for the cluster execution. A value of "NONE" signals no highly available setup. To enable high-availability, set this mode to "ZOOKEEPER".

      • HA_CLUSTER_ID

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_CLUSTER_ID
        The ID of the Flink cluster, used to separate multiple Flink clusters Needs to be set for standalone clusters, is automatically inferred in YARN and Mesos.

      • HA_STORAGE_PATH

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_STORAGE_PATH
        File system path (URI) where Flink persists metadata in high-availability setups

      • HA_JOB_MANAGER_PORT_RANGE

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_JOB_MANAGER_PORT_RANGE
        Optional port (range) used by the job manager in high-availability mode.

      • HA_JOB_DELAY

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_JOB_DELAY
        The time before a JobManager after a fail over recovers the current jobs.

      • HA_ZOOKEEPER_QUORUM

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_ZOOKEEPER_QUORUM
        The ZooKeeper quorum to use, when running Flink in a high-availability mode with ZooKeeper.

      • HA_ZOOKEEPER_ROOT

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_ZOOKEEPER_ROOT
        The root path under which Flink stores its entries in ZooKeeper

      • HA_ZOOKEEPER_NAMESPACE

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_ZOOKEEPER_NAMESPACE

      • HA_ZOOKEEPER_LATCH_PATH

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_ZOOKEEPER_LATCH_PATH

      • HA_ZOOKEEPER_JOBGRAPHS_PATH

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_ZOOKEEPER_JOBGRAPHS_PATH
        ZooKeeper root path (ZNode) for job graphs.

      • HA_ZOOKEEPER_LEADER_PATH

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_ZOOKEEPER_LEADER_PATH

      • HA_ZOOKEEPER_CHECKPOINTS_PATH

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_ZOOKEEPER_CHECKPOINTS_PATH
        ZooKeeper root path (ZNode) for completed checkpoints.

      • HA_ZOOKEEPER_CHECKPOINT_COUNTER_PATH

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_ZOOKEEPER_CHECKPOINT_COUNTER_PATH
        ZooKeeper root path (ZNode) for checkpoint counters.

      • HA_ZOOKEEPER_MESOS_WORKERS_PATH

        @PublicEvolving
public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> HA_ZOOKEEPER_MESOS_WORKERS_PATH
        ZooKeeper root path (ZNode) for Mesos workers.

      • ZOOKEEPER_SESSION_TIMEOUT

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> ZOOKEEPER_SESSION_TIMEOUT

      • ZOOKEEPER_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> ZOOKEEPER_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> ZOOKEEPER_RETRY_WAIT

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> ZOOKEEPER_MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS

      • ZOOKEEPER_RUNNING_JOB_REGISTRY_PATH

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> ZOOKEEPER_RUNNING_JOB_REGISTRY_PATH

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> ZOOKEEPER_CLIENT_ACL
